about_the_game:
CLOCKWORLD is a narrative adventure game in a world torn apart.



First he was driven off his island, now he has to deal with memory loss and a strange voice in his head – Aro seems to be having more than just a bad day.
‍
Venture to the mystical island of Ura and guide him through impactful moral choices, help the enigmatic locals, and discover your own truth as you save the world – or not. It's all up to you!
‍
In this fantastical adventure, your decisions will pave the way – what kind of story will you create together?

The clock Is ticking ...

Adventure

Experience a dramatic, captivating and very personal story that will stay with you even after the credits roll!

Visually Outstanding

Immerse yourself in a shattered world of flying, fragmented islands – in an enchanting, hand-drawn style!

Dilemma

Make important decisions and face moral conflicts through an innovative dialogue system!

Mess with them

Decide for yourself whether or not to interfere with the lives of the characters you encounter!

Clockworld

Explore a civilisation with different cultures, traditions, social systems and political beliefs!

Full English Voice-Over

Featuring the voices of Lin Gothoni (Life is Strange: True Colors), Seumas F. Sargent (Spy City, from Tom of Finland) and Cyrus Nemati (Hades, Pyre)

For Everyone!

Also perfect for casual gamers looking for an exciting adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.40 GHz / Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560, 4GB / GeForce GTX 950, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CLOCKWORLD is a narrative adventure game. Join Aro on a mystical journey through a literally broken world. Your decisions are his compass in this fantastic tale about self-determination, destiny and finding purpose.

English*, German
